page.title: 05Activities For Girls
page.content: In the area there are many activities but some are designed secifically for girls. 1985 is the 75th anniversary of the{ {Brownie}and{Guide}movement{Brownies have been in Milborne Port for a great number of years and meet Tuesday at the Church Hall.Children can join between the ages of 7 and 10.At 10 they leave{Brownies}and go to the senior section which is the {Girl {Guides}. The{Guides}celebrated their 60th anniversary in 1985.They have always been well supported in the area and there are around 20 members.They regularly join with other{Guides}in the area for activities such as camping in 1983 a{Majorette Troup}was formed of girls aged 8 to 16.They take part in competitions and displays all over the area,there are about25members
